Course Pricing

Depending on course length, all our courses follow a fixed price scheme...

2 day short course
€300
  • Live teaching (online)
  • 12 course hours (ex. breaks)
  • Hands-on supervised excercises
  • Extensive materials (e.g., problem sets and solutions)
  • 15 min p.p. individual consulting after the course
3 day course
€450
  • Live teaching (online)
  • 18 course hours (ex. breaks)
  • Hands-on supervised excercises
  • Extensive materials (e.g., problem sets and solutions)
  • 30 min p.p. individual consulting after the course
5 day long course
€600
  • Live teaching (online)
  • 30 course hours (ex. breaks)
  • Hands-on supervised excercises
  • Extensive materials (e.g., problem sets and solutions)
  • 30 min p.p. individual consulting after the course
